solution_line_template: Kelly held her breath for {kelly_minutes} minutes, or {kelly_minutes}*{seconds_per_minute}=<<{kelly_minutes}*{seconds_per_minute}={kelly_seconds}>>{kelly_seconds} seconds.

Brittany held her breath for {brittany_less_than_kelly} seconds less time than Kelly did, or {kelly_seconds}-{brittany_less_than_kelly}=<<{kelly_seconds}-{brittany_less_than_kelly}={brittany_seconds}>>{brittany_seconds} seconds

And Buffy held her breath for {buffy_less_than_brittany} seconds less time than Brittany did, or for {brittany_seconds}-{buffy_less_than_brittany}=<<{brittany_seconds}-{buffy_less_than_brittany}={buffy_seconds}>>{buffy_seconds} seconds.
